import { useEffect,useState } from "react" import { getNeighbour } from "./Neighbour" export const Neigh : React.FC = ():JSX.Element=>{ const [data,setData] = useState({ cases :0, deaths:0, recoveries:0, active:0 }) const country = ['us','india','brazil','germany'] useEffect(()=>{ const fetchAffect = ()=>{ country.forEach((el)=>{ const effect =getNeighbour(el) }) setData(affect) console.log(data) } fetchAffect() },[country]) return
